item.Q:
Write the character:
bitter; intensely; miserable; painful
item.A:
kǔ
痛苦 tòngkǔ pain; suffering; painful

item.Q:
Write the character:
an interjection; to express realization or agreement (yes, oh, right etc)
item.A:
唉 (strokes unavailable)
āi
唉声叹气 (唉聲嘆氣) āishēngtànqì heave deep sighs; sigh in despair

item.Q:
Write the character:
festival; section; segment; point; part; to economize; to save; temperate; classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses
item.A:
traditional: 節
jié
调节 (調節) tiáojié adjust; regulate

item.Q:
Write the character:
good fortune; happiness; luck; abbr. for Fujian 福建 province; surname
item.A:
fú
幸福 xìngfú blessed; happiness; happy

item.Q:
Write the character:
parent; one's own (flesh and blood); relative; related; marriage; bride; close; intimate; in person; first-hand; in favor of; pro-; to kiss
item.A:
traditional: 親
qīn
母亲 (母親) mǔqīn mother (formal)

item.Q:
Write the character:
ancient; old; palaeo-; surname
item.A:
gǔ
古代 gǔdài ancient times; olden times

item.Q:
Write the character:
continue; replenish
item.A:
续 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 續
xù
继续 (繼續) jìxù to continue; to proceed with; to go on with

item.Q:
Write the character:
to deliver; to carry; to give (as a present); to present (with); to see off; to send
item.A:
sòng
输送 (輸送) shūsòng transport; carry

item.Q:
Write the character:
positive (electric.); sun; male principle (Taoism); Yang, opposite of 陰|阴 yin1 ☯
item.A:
阳 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 陽
yáng
阳光 (陽光) yángguāng sunshine

item.Q:
Write the character:
spring (time); gay; joyful; youthful; love; lust; life
item.A:
chūn
春秋 chūnqiū spring and autumn; four seasons; the year; a person's age; Spring and Autumn period (770-476 BC), with many states contending for hegemony; Spring and Autumn Annals, one of the Confucian Five Classics 五經|五经; used in book titles
